entity.name: Trump says he discussed Venezuela and the Mueller report with Putin in an hour-long call
entity.description: President Trump confirmed the call in a series of Tweets on Friday, adding that the political turmoil in Venezuela was also a subject of a phone conversation with Russia's Vladimir Putin. Referring to the report's conclusion that Russia interfered in the 2016 election while clearing the Trump campaign of conspiracy, Trump said he and Putin discussed the "Russia Hoax."

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Why don’t you get off social media & golf courses & take care of far more important things you are determined to neglect? Like your buddy Putin putting contracts on American/UK soldiers, thousands of Americans dying from coronavirus, racial injustice and a faltering economy.
